definition: in a flash/in the blink of an eye/to glance
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
in a wink
what the eye doesn't see the heart doesn't miss (idiom)
to pass in an instant/over in the twinkling of an eye

sentences.english: Whole life blown away in the brink of eye.
sentences.chinese: 你的一生在轉眼之間就毀掉了。

sentences.english: He was gone in a trice.
Presto, sample sentences and usage examples.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，就能看到例句和用法示例。

sentences.english: in the New Year. We wish the merriest of Christmas to you and your loved
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節轉眼又到，又該迎接新的一年了。

sentences.english: Was precisely a life like has sent, namely passed in an instant horridness.
sentences.chinese: 正是道盡了人生如寄，轉眼即逝的惶恐。

sentences.english: In a trice, the street was empty.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼之間，大街上就空無一人。

sentences.english: When the young man went to college, he decided to try out for the football team as a "walk-on."
sentences.chinese: 轉眼少年進了大學，決心拼進校隊，跑龍套也歡喜。

sentences.english: Your love is too easy to sell, the next instant to deletion.
sentences.chinese: 你的感情太易割愛，把未來轉眼就刪改。

sentences.english: However turn one eye deeply in winter stanza, the contents of this gossip slightly has diversity.
sentences.chinese: 不過轉眼深冬季節，這個閒話的內容略有變化。

sentences.english: These windows are 9 inches thick. If they go, it's sayonara in two microseconds.
sentences.chinese: 窗的厚度是9寸，要是破裂，所有的人轉眼就沒命。

sentences.english: Girl, it has been one year and seven months since we were torn apart.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，我們分開至今已是一年零七月了。

sentences.english: Overnight, the US was cast as a rogue nation.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，美國自己也被視爲一個流氓國家。

sentences.english: Inexorably, time rapid, since then, we have will face looking for a job.
sentences.chinese: 斗轉星移，時光飛速，轉眼間，我們已將面臨找工作。

sentences.english: New year is coming, I wish everyone will be happy.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間又是一年，但願每個人夢想成真。

sentences.english: Blink of an eye, Tianshui phase appeared together with the landlord Hongxia.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，天水相接的地主出現了一道紅霞。

sentences.english: The kid didn't move anything but his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 小子轉了轉眼珠，還是一動不動。
